data.name: qryListe2.SelectStatement
data.value:
DECLARE @InstitutionFldID INT DECLARE @PlatzierungFldID INT SET @InstitutionFldID = (SELECT DynaFieldID FROM dbo.DynaField WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE FieldName = 'VmAuftragStatPInstitution') SET @PlatzierungFldID = (SELECT DynaFieldID FROM dbo.DynaField WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE FieldName = 'VmAuftragStatGPlatzierung')
DECLARE @Data Table ( FaLeistungID INT, Institution INT, Platzierung VARCHAR(10) )
---------------------------------- ---------- Collect Data ---------------------------------- INSERT INTO @Data SELECT FaLeistungID = FAL.FaLeistungID, Institution = CONVERT(INT, INS.Value), Platzierung = CONVERT(VARCHAR, PLZ.Value) FROM dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.DynaValue INS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON INS.FaLeistungID = FAL.FaLeistungID AND INS.DynaFieldID = @InstitutionFldID LEFT JOIN dbo.DynaValue PLZ WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PLZ.FaLeistungID = FAL.FaLeistungID AND PLZ.DynaFieldID = @PlatzierungFldID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID WHERE FAL.ModulID = 5 -- Vormundschaft AND FAL.FaProzessCode = 505 -- Vormundschaftlicher Auftrag AND {edtAuswertungsjahr} BETWEEN YEAR(FAL.DatumVon) AND isNull(YEAR(FAL.DatumBis),{edtAuswertungsjahr}) -- Fall aktiv in Periode AND OUU.OrgUnitID IN (SELECT OrgUnitID FROM dbo.XOrgUnit WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE ModulID = 3 AND ParentID = 28) -- es sollen nur Einträge der Sektion Jugendamt angezeigt werden --- AND OUU.OrgUnitID = {edtOrgUnitID} --- AND USR.UserID = {edtUserID.LookupID}
------------------------------------------ ------------ Result Table ------------------------------------------ DECLARE @Result TABLE( Abteilung VARCHAR(100), SAR VARCHAR(100), [Pflegefam] INT, [Tageselt] INT, [SOS Fam] INT, [Grossfam] INT, [Inst.Fampl] INT, [Wohnh] INT, [Schulh] INT, [Durchg.h] INT, [WG] INT, [Kita] INT, [BEO] INT, [Klinik] INT, [Tagesstr] INT, [TimeO] INT, [andere] INT, [Total] INT, [Neupl] INT, [Umpl] INT, [nsInst] INT, [akant] INT, Sortkey1$ INT, Sortkey2$ INT )
------- Abteilung INSERT INTO @Result SELECT MAX(ORG.ItemName), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, ORG.OrgUnitID, NULL FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY ORG.OrgUnitID
------- Total Abteilung INSERT INTO @Result SELECT NULL, 'Total', SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 13 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 14 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution BETWEEN 1 AND 15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Platzierung+',%' LIKE '%,1,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Platzierung+',%' LIKE '%,2,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Platzierung+',%' LIKE '%,3,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Platzierung+',%' LIKE '%,4,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ORG.OrgUnitID, 2 FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY ORG.OrgUnitID
------- Leerzeile pro Abteilung INSERT INTO @Result SELECT NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, ORG.OrgUnitID, 3 FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY ORG.OrgUnitID
------- pro SAR INSERT INTO @Result SELECT NULL, MAX(USR.LastName + ISNULL(', ' + USR.FirstName,'')), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 13 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 14 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution BETWEEN 1 AND 15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Platzierung+',%' LIKE '%,1,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Platzierung+',%' LIKE '%,2,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Platzierung+',%' LIKE '%,3,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Platzierung+',%' LIKE '%,4,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), MAX(ORG.OrgUnitID), 1 FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY USR.UserID
------- Total INSERT INTO @Result SELECT 'Total', NULL, SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 13 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 14 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution = 15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN DAT.Institution BETWEEN 1 AND 15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Platzierung+',%' LIKE '%,1,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Platzierung+',%' LIKE '%,2,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Platzierung+',%' LIKE '%,3,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Platzierung+',%' LIKE '%,4,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 9999999, NULL FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID
------ just cosmetics UPDATE @Result SET [Pflegefam] = CASE WHEN [Pflegefam] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Pflegefam] END, [Tageselt] = CASE WHEN [Tageselt] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Tageselt] END, [SOS Fam] = CASE WHEN [SOS Fam] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [SOS Fam] END, [Grossfam] = CASE WHEN [Grossfam] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Grossfam] END, [Inst.Fampl] = CASE WHEN [Inst.Fampl] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Inst.Fampl] END, [Wohnh] = CASE WHEN [Wohnh] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Wohnh] END, [Schulh] = CASE WHEN [Schulh] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Schulh] END, [Durchg.h] = CASE WHEN [Durchg.h] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Durchg.h] END, [WG] = CASE WHEN [WG] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [WG] END, [Kita] = CASE WHEN [Kita] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Kita] END, [BEO] = CASE WHEN [BEO] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [BEO] END, [Klinik] = CASE WHEN [Klinik] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Klinik] END, [Tagesstr] = CASE WHEN [Tagesstr] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Tagesstr] END, [TimeO] = CASE WHEN [TimeO] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [TimeO] END, [andere] = CASE WHEN [andere] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [andere] END, [Neupl] = CASE WHEN [Neupl] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Neupl] END, [Umpl] = CASE WHEN [Umpl] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [Umpl] END, [nsInst] = CASE WHEN [nsInst] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [nsInst] END, [akant] = CASE WHEN [akant] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE [akant] END WHERE SAR <> 'Total' AND isNull(Abteilung, '') <> 'Total'
SELECT * FROM @Result ORDER BY Sortkey1$, Abteilung DESC, Sortkey2$, SAR

data.name: qryQuery.SelectStatement
data.value:
DECLARE @InstitutionFldID INT DECLARE @PlatzierungFldID INT SET @InstitutionFldID = (SELECT DynaFieldID FROM dbo.DynaField WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE FieldName = 'VmAuftragStatPInstitution') SET @PlatzierungFldID = (SELECT DynaFieldID FROM dbo.DynaField WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE FieldName = 'VmAuftragStatGPlatzierung')
DECLARE @Data Table ( FaLeistungID INT, Institution INT, Platzierung VARCHAR(10) )
---------------------------------- ---------- Collect Data ---------------------------------- INSERT INTO @Data SELECT FaLeistungID = FAL.FaLeistungID, Institution = CONVERT(INT, INS.Value), Platzierung = CONVERT(VARCHAR, PLZ.Value) FROM dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.DynaValue INS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON INS.FaLeistungID = FAL.FaLeistungID AND INS.DynaFieldID = @InstitutionFldID LEFT JOIN dbo.DynaValue PLZ WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PLZ.FaLeistungID = FAL.FaLeistungID AND PLZ.DynaFieldID = @PlatzierungFldID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID WHERE FAL.ModulID = 5 -- Vormundschaft AND FAL.FaProzessCode = 505 -- Vormundschaftlicher Auftrag AND {edtAuswertungsjahr} BETWEEN YEAR(FAL.DatumVon) AND isNull(YEAR(FAL.DatumBis),{edtAuswertungsjahr}) -- Fall aktiv in Periode AND OUU.OrgUnitID IN (SELECT OrgUnitID FROM dbo.XOrgUnit WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE ModulID = 3 AND ParentID = 28) -- es sollen nur Einträge der Sektion Jugendamt angezeigt werden --- AND OUU.OrgUnitID = {edtOrgUnitID} --- AND USR.UserID = {edtUserID.LookupID}
---------------------------------- ---------- List 1 ---------- Data overview ---------------------------------- SELECT BaPersonID$ = PRS.BaPersonID, Sektion = ORG.ItemName, SAR = USR.LastName + ISNULL(', ' + USR.FirstName,''), Person = PRS.Name + ISNULL(', ' + PRS.Vorname,''), [Alter] = dbo.fngetage(PRS.Geburtsdatum, GETDATE()), Geschlecht = CASE PRS.GeschlechtCode WHEN 1 THEN 'm' WHEN 2 THEN 'f' ELSE '?' END, [Nationalität] = LAN.Text, Institution = dbo.fnLovText('VmPlatzierungInstitution', DAT.Institution), Platzierung = dbo.fnLOVTextListe('VmPlatzierung', DAT.Platzierung) FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID LEFT JOIN dbo.BaLand LAN WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.NationalitaetCode = LAN.BaLandID WHERE DAT.Institution IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 2,3,4
